data.eml:eml: Description of a new Kempnyia Klapálek from Brazil (Plecoptera: Perlidae) with life stages associated using DNA barcodes

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Avelino-Capistrano, Fernanda, Barbosa, Leandro Silva, Takiya, Daniela Maeda (2016): Description of a new Kempnyia Klapálek from Brazil (Plecoptera: Perlidae) with life stages associated using DNA barcodes. Zootaxa 4079 (3), DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4079.3.5
